channel.title: How will singularity be like and by when will we achieve it? Completely and utterly forever changed before 2040
channel.description:
https://www.dropbox.com/s/osk8q1ujlrlljbf/2016-02-05%2017.59.00.jpg?dl=1 <small>([Originally answered in quora](https://www.quora.com/How-will-singularity-be-like-and-by-when-will-we-achieve-it?__snids__=1546970943))</small>
How? I can tell you how it won't be like, but it'd sure be fun if it's any close: http://b.cregox.com/a-novel
One thing is for certain: humans and humanity will be **completely changed** by it. A bigger evolutional leap than anything that ever happened before.
And it will most certainly happen before 2040, as Ray Kurzweil genius predicts.
I truly cheer for start seeing it within the next 7 years (5 years before a PC can emulate a human brain on its own), but who knows? In science, any prediction with more than 5 years advance is about the same as saying "nobody knows, we can only hope".
